Package com.ae2dms.Controllers

Class GameController

java.lang.Object
com.ae2dms.Controllers.GameController
All Implemented Interfaces:
FileHandler
public class GameController
extends java.lang.Object
implements FileHandler

The Class GameController is the controller class of game.fxml. Initialize the game scene, implements the FileHandler interface and defines a game scene event.

Since:
1.0
Version:
1.0
Author:
Yixin SHEN
date
2020/11/17-13:49

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize() throws java.io.IOException
      Initialize the game scene element.

      Set the primaryStage to Main.primaryStage. Load the game file and play BGM of the game. Instantiate a dialog factory, set the LevelMove label's text to the level move of current level.

      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - IOException
      date
      2020/11/29-14:41

    • loadDefaultSaveFile

      void loadDefaultSaveFile() throws java.io.IOException
      Load game .skb file, set two different event handler.

      Load the .skb game file according to the static archive value, set two different event handler that player can use key board to control the game. Transform the stream type to InputStream, utilize it as the parameter for initializeGame function.

      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - IOException
      date
      2020/11/20-13:01

    • initializeGame

      private void initializeGame​(java.io.InputStream input) throws java.io.IOException
      Instantiate a new gameEngine object.

      Instantiate a new gameEngine object, reload the gameGrid map.

      Parameters:
      input - InputStream got from .skb archive file.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - IOException
      date
      2020/11/29-15:04

    • setEventFilter1

      private void setEventFilter1()
      Set even handler one, allow Player control the game move.

      Set evenFilter, for gameEngine function, and bind to primary stag; Reload the gameGrid.

      date
      2020/11/29-15:06

    • setEventFilter2

      private void setEventFilter2()
      Set even handler two, allow Player control the game pause by ESC and return to menu by F1.

      Set evenFilter, for gameEngine function, and bind to primary stag; Reload the gameGrid.

      date
      2020/11/29-15:06

    • Pause

      public void Pause​(javafx.scene.input.KeyCode code)
      Press ESCAPE key on keyboard to pause the screen.

      When user press ESCAPE key, if the game is not paused, set Paused pane as visible, and delete the eventFilter1, stop the music. else, set Paused pane as non-visible, and set the eventFilter1, play the music.

      Parameters:
      code - KeyCode from keyboard
      date
      2020/11/29-15:09

    • loadGameFile

      private void loadGameFile() throws java.io.IOException
      Load the game .skb file by file chooser.

      Load the game .skb file, set the extension filter that only .skb file can be seen in the file chooser. If saveFile is not NULL, call the initializeGame function using the file has been chosen.

      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - IOException
      date
      2020/11/29-15:15

    • reloadGrid

      public void reloadGrid() throws java.io.IOException
      Reload the game map in gameGrid fxml element.

      Reload the game map in gameGrid fxml element every time call this function. If game has been completed, delete tow eventFilter, saveGame, prompt a Vic dialog and call the saveScore function to save the game score to ranking.txt. Jump to rank scene and erase the archive file.

      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - IOException
      date
      2020/11/29-15:18

    • showAbout

      public void showAbout()
      Prompt a about dialog.

      Play the interface click sound, pop up a about dialog

      date
      2020/11/29-15:32

    • addObjectToGrid

      private void addObjectToGrid​(GameObject gameObject, java.awt.Point location)
      Add Game object to the grid.

      Add game object to the gameGrid according to the gameObject type.

      Parameters:
      gameObject - Game object type.
      location - The location of the game object in the 20*20 map.
      date
      2020/11/29-15:34

    • closeGame

      public void closeGame​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Close the game.

      Click the Exit, play the interface sound of click and exit.

      Parameters:
      actionEvent - Mouse click.
      date
      2020/11/17-20:35

    • saveGame

      public void saveGame​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Save the current game state to archive file.

      Save the current play state as a .sdk file to resources/Archives/ path and play the interface sound.

      Parameters:
      actionEvent - Mouse click.
      date
      2020/11/15-16:33

    • loadGame

      public void loadGame​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Load the game file.

      Call the loadGameFile function, use file chooser to allow user choose game file for play and play the interface sound.

      Parameters:
      actionEvent - Mouse click.
      date
      2020/11/29-16:31

    • undo

      public void undo​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws java.io.IOException
      Unto the last move, back to the previous state.

      Return back to last step, refresh the gameGrid and play the interface sound. If it is the first step, pop up a undo warning dialog.

      Parameters:
      actionEvent - Mouse click.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - IOException
      date
      2020/11/13-15:47

    • resetLevel

      public void resetLevel​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws java.io.IOException
      Reset the current level to its original state.

      Reset the whole level to its original state by load the SampleGame.skb file. Clear the keeperTrack and gameGridsTrack. Pop up a confirmation first that let user can cancel its operation.

      Parameters:
      actionEvent - Mouse click.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - IOException
      date
      2020/11/13-16:34

    • toggleDebug

      public void toggleDebug​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws java.io.IOException
      Turn on/off the debug pattern.

      Turn on/off debug pattern, reload the game grids and play the interface sound.

      Parameters:
      actionEvent - Mouse click.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - IOException
      date
      2020/11/15-13:53

    • toggleMusic

      public void toggleMusic​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Turn on/off game BGM.

      Turn on/off game BGM, if music is false before calling this function, start to play music; If music is true, stop the music;

      Parameters:
      actionEvent - Mouse click.
      date
      2020/11/15-13:50

    • returnMenu

      public void returnMenu() throws java.io.IOException
      Return to menu.

      return to the menu scene, and stop the BGM, delete both eventFilter set to the primary stage Turn off the soundEffect of the gameEngine, set the selectedLevel value to zero.

      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - IOException
      date
      2020/11/18-17:57

    • saveGame

      public static void saveGame()
      Save the current game state to the corresponding archive file.

      Save the current game state to the archive file, including map name, level move count, etc..

      date
      2020/11/22-16:08

    • selectLevel

      public void selectLevel​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws java.io.IOException
      Set the scene to level scene.

      Play the interface sound, delete both eventFilters bind to the primary stage, stop the game BGM, set the soundEffect of game to false. Save the gameSate and set the scene to level scene.

      Parameters:
      actionEvent - Mouse click
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - IOException
      date
      2020/11/29-16:47
